message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you get something too.  What do you say?
I'll take a smaller share, but I want a bigger piece of the pie than last time. What do you think?
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but this is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take the smaller share this time, but I'm not giving up yet. You're getting less than before, but I'm still trying to make a deal.
